entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sparwood
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 10 mm over northern sections. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
